name: iTube
description: ITube is a decentralized platform that leverages the power of blockchain technology in empowering content creators on how their content is delivered to a global audience. Our forum is built on a transparent Peer-to-Peer network powered by programmable smart contracts to enable fair remuneration for all content and services. The ITube Watch2earn platform is built with the core purpose of enabling and changing the lives of content creators around the world.
